00021         __int8 MouseTransitions[10];

00024         OIS::MouseState CurrentMouseState;

00026         InputData()
00027         {
00028             memset(KeyStates, 0, sizeof(KeyStates));
00029             memset(KeyTransitions, 0, sizeof(KeyTransitions));
00030         }        
00031         
00032         // Is the key presently down?
00033         bool isDown(OIS::KeyCode code);
00034         
00035         //Is the mouse button presently down?
00036         bool isDown(OIS::MouseButtonID button);
00037         
00038         // Is the key presently up?
00039         bool isUp(OIS::KeyCode code);
00040         
00041         //Is the mouse button presently up?
00042         bool isUp(OIS::MouseButtonID button);
00043         
00044         // Has key just been pressed this last cycle?
00045         bool justDown(OIS::KeyCode code);
00046         
00047         // Has the mouse button been pressed this last cycle?
00048         bool justDown(OIS::MouseButtonID button);
00049         
00050         // Has key just been released this last cycle?
00051         bool justUp(OIS::KeyCode code);
00052         
00053         // Has the mouse button been released this last cycle?
00054         bool justUp(OIS::MouseButtonID button);
00055
